name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench with your feet firmly on the ground. Grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower it to your mid-chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle. Press back up to the starting position.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench, feet flat on the floor. Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower it to your upper chest, then press back up.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a decline bench, securing your feet. Grip the barbell wider than shoulder-width. Lower it to your lower chest, then press back up.

name: Barbell Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over mid-foot. Grip the bar, bend at the hips, keep back straight. Lift by extending hips and knees.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Use a wider stance, grip the bar inside your knees. Keep back straight, lift by driving through the legs and hips.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold the barbell at hip level, feet shoulder-width. Hinge at the hips, lower the bar while keeping back straight, return to start.

name: Conventional Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bar on your upper back. Lower until thighs are parallel to the floor, push back up.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Hold the bar on the front of your shoulders. Lower into a squat while keeping the torso upright, then stand back up.

name: Overhead Squat
instructions: Hold the bar overhead with a wide grip. Keep your core tight as you squat down, maintaining balance, then return to standing.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine. Place feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Push the weight up, then lower under control.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Stand a few feet in front of a bench. Place one foot on the bench behind you. Lower into a lunge position, then push back up.

name: Lunges
instructions: Stand upright, holding dumbbells. Step forward, lowering your back knee toward the ground. Push back up and repeat.

name: Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on the calf raise machine with toes on the platform. Raise heels as high as possible, then lower back down.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit on the calf raise machine with feet on the platform. Push up onto your toes, then lower back down.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at the lat pulldown machine, grip the bar wider than shoulder-width. Pull the bar down to your chest, then return slowly.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Grab a pull-up bar with an overhand grip. Pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar, then lower back down.

name: Bent-Over Barbell Row
instructions: Hold the bar with an overhand grip, hinge forward at the hips. Pull the bar to your torso, then lower back down.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee on a bench, hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand. Pull the weight to your side, then lower.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand upright, hold a barbell with an underhand grip. Curl the bar up to your shoulders, then lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand. Curl the weights up, squeezing your biceps, then lower back down.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing in. Curl the weights up, then lower back down.

name: Triceps Dips
instructions: Grip parallel bars, lower yourself until elbows are at 90 degrees, then push back up.

name: Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Grip the cable attachment, push it down until arms are fully extended, then return slowly.

name: Overhead Triceps Extension
instructions: Hold a dumbbell overhead with both hands. Lower behind your head, then extend back up.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the barbell with hands closer than shoulder-width. Lower to your chest, then press back up.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on a bench, hold an EZ bar with an overhand grip. Lower the bar to your forehead, then extend your arms back up.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand with a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height. Press the weights overhead, then lower back to the starting position.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell at shoulder height. Press the bar overhead, then lower back down.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing you. Rotate palms outward as you press the weights overhead, then lower.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Raise arms out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower slowly.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your thighs. Lift the weights forward to shoulder height, then lower.

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Bend at the waist, hold dumbbells with palms facing in. Raise arms out to the sides, squeezing shoulder blades together, then lower.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Attach a rope to a cable machine at face height. Pull the rope towards your face, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand beside a cable machine, grasp the handle with the opposite hand. Raise arm out to the side, then lower slowly.

name: Seated Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: Sit on a bench holding dumbbells. Shrug your shoulders as high as possible, then lower back down.

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions: Hold a barbell in front of your thighs with an overhand grip. Shrug your shoulders up, then lower back down.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar, raise legs straight in front of you to waist height, then lower back down.

name: Decline Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on a decline bench with feet secured. Perform a sit-up by contracting your abs, then lower back down.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit on the ground, hold a medicine ball. Twist your torso side to side, keeping your core engaged.

name: Plank
instructions: Lie face down, rest on forearms and toes. Keep body straight and core engaged, holding the position as long as possible.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on your side, prop up on one forearm. Keep body straight and hold the position for the desired duration.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar, raise knees towards your chest, then lower back down.

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back, lift legs off the ground. Curl knees towards your chest, then lower back down.

name: Leg Raises
instructions: Lie flat, keep legs straight. Lift them to 90 degrees, then lower slowly.

name: Cable Woodchopper
instructions: Attach a handle to a cable machine at a high setting. Pull the cable diagonally across your body while twisting your torso.

name: Battle Ropes
instructions: Hold battle ropes in each hand. Use quick, alternating arm movements to create waves.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Swing the kettlebell between your legs, then drive hips forward to propel it upward.

name: Box Jump
instructions: Stand in front of a box, jump up, landing softly on top, then step down.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench with dumbbells in each hand. Press the weights up until arms are fully extended, then lower back down.

name: Chest Fly
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, hold dumbbells above your chest. Lower the weights out to the sides, then bring them back together.

name: Cable Chest Fly
instructions: Stand between two cable machines, grasp the handles. Bring your hands together in front of your chest, then return to the starting position.

name: Push-Up
instructions: Start in a plank position, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground, then push back up.

name: Wide-Grip Pull-Up
instructions: Grab a pull-up bar with a wide grip. Pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar, then lower back down.

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Grab a pull-up bar with an underhand grip. Pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar, then lower back down.

name: T-Bar Row
instructions: Stand over a T-bar row machine, grip the handles. Pull the bar towards your torso, then lower back down.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee on a bench, hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand. Pull the weight to your side, then lower.

name: Inverted Row
instructions: Lie under a bar, grip it with an overhand grip. Pull your chest up to the bar, then lower back down.

name: Cable Row
instructions: Sit at a cable row machine, grip the handle. Pull the handle towards your torso, then return to the starting position.

name: Preacher Curl
instructions: Sit at a preacher bench, hold a barbell with an underhand grip. Curl the bar up, then lower slowly.

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit on a bench, hold a dumbbell in one hand. Curl the weight up, focusing on your bicep, then lower back down.

name: Zottman Curl
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing up. Curl the weights up, then rotate your palms down and lower the weights.

name: Incline Dumbbell Curl
instructions: Sit on an incline bench, hold dumbbells with palms facing up. Curl the weights up, then lower back down.

name: Cable Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand in front of a cable machine, grip the handle with an underhand grip. Curl the handle up, then lower back down.

name: Lying Triceps Extension
instructions: Lie on a bench, hold a barbell with an overhand grip. Lower the bar to your forehead, then extend your arms back up.

name: Dumbbell Kickback
instructions: Bend at the waist, hold a dumbbell in each hand. Extend your arms back, squeezing your triceps, then lower.

name: Cable Overhead Triceps Extension
instructions: Attach a rope to a cable machine, hold it overhead. Lower the rope behind your head, then extend your arms back up.

name: Diamond Push-Up
instructions: Start in a push-up position with your hands close together, forming a diamond shape. Lower your body, then push back up.

name: EZ Bar Triceps Extension
instructions: Hold an EZ bar with an overhand grip. Lower the bar behind your head, then extend your arms back up.

name: Seated Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: Sit on a bench, hold a barbell at shoulder height. Press the bar overhead, then lower back down.

name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides, raise them out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower back down.

name: Cable Front Raise
instructions: Stand in front of a cable machine, grip the handle with one hand. Lift the handle forward to shoulder height, then lower.

name: Reverse Fly
instructions: Bend at the waist, hold dumbbells with palms facing in. Raise arms out to the sides, squeezing shoulder blades together, then lower.

name: Cable Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Stand between two cable machines, grasp the handles. Pull your arms back, squeezing your shoulder blades together, then return to the starting position.

name: Upright Row
instructions: Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, lift it straight up to your chin, then lower back down.

name: Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides, shrug your shoulders up, then lower back down.

name: Farmer's Walk
instructions: Hold heavy dumbbells at your sides, walk a set distance while keeping your core engaged.

name: Cable Shrug
instructions: Stand in front of a cable machine, grip the handles. Shrug your shoulders up, then lower back down.

name: Barbell Upright Row
instructions: Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, lift it straight up to your chin, then lower back down.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in a plank position, bring one knee towards your chest, then switch legs quickly.

name: Bicycle Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back, bring one knee towards your chest while twisting your torso to touch the opposite elbow to the knee.

name: V-Up
instructions: Lie on your back, lift your legs and torso off the ground simultaneously, forming a V shape, then lower back down.

name: Flutter Kicks
instructions: Lie on your back, lift your legs slightly off the ground. Alternate kicking your legs up and down.

name: Toe Touches
instructions: Lie on your back, lift your legs straight up. Reach your hands towards your toes, then lower back down.

name: Side Crunch
instructions: Lie on your side, lift your legs and torso off the ground simultaneously, then lower back down.

name: Cable Crunch
instructions: Attach a rope to a cable machine, kneel down. Pull the rope down while crunching your abs, then return to the starting position.

name: Ab Wheel Rollout
instructions: Kneel on the ground, hold an ab wheel. Roll the wheel forward, keeping your core engaged, then roll back to the starting position.

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Hold a jump rope in each hand, swing it over your head and jump over it as it passes under your feet.

name: Burpees
instructions: Start in a standing position, drop into a push-up position, perform a push-up, then jump back up to standing.

name: Sprinting
instructions: Run at maximum speed for a short distance, focusing on explosive power.

name: Jump Squat
instructions: Perform a squat, then jump explosively into the air, landing softly back into a squat position.

name: Lunge Jump
instructions: Perform a lunge, then jump explosively into the air, switching legs mid-air and landing in a lunge position.

name: Step-Up
instructions: Stand in front of a step or bench, step up onto it with one leg, then bring the other leg up. Step back down and repeat.

name: Wall Sit
instructions: Stand with your back against a wall, lower yourself into a seated position with thighs parallel to the ground, and hold.

name: Calf Press on Leg Press Machine
instructions: Sit on a leg press machine, place your toes on the platform. Press the weight up using your calves, then lower back down.
